Name: Pontiac fever
Definition: A legionellosis that involves a milder respiratory illness without pneumonia. Symptoms include fever

Name: obsolete tracheobronchial tuberculosis
Definition: A pulmonary tuberculosis involving inflammation of trachea and bronchi. The symptoms include dry cough followed by dyspnea

Name: Legionnaires' disease
Definition: A legionellosis that is characterized by severe form of infection producing pneumonia. Symptoms include fever
